name: 英文（三）：運動英文
restrict: ◎限體育系（學）、競技系（學）選修 ◎必須先修過【共同英文(一)】◎必須先修過【共同英文(二)】
description:
藉由主題式課程，加深學生對該領域實務趨勢認識、議題簡報、實務案例討論與批判分析。
強化學生該領域之實務/任務型英語口語溝通、簡報、寫作表達能力
goals: 提升英語組織與跨文化溝通表達能力
培養實務案例批判及分析能力
拓展國際視野及移動力
促進實務領域的協作能力
syllabus: English (III): Sports English (Syllabus for 2021 Fall Semester) LEE, Shih-wen Email: t22032@ntnu.edu.tw Office: #805, Cheng Building 8th F Office Hours: 4-6 p.m., Friday Course Objectives: This course aims to help students become better English learners through studying selected articles or essays about the history, development, events, and competitions of various sports. Most of the handouts are adapted from sports textbooks, the Internet, and encyclopedia or Wikipedia. The sports introduced are those that enjoy greater popularity in everyday life and on TV broadcast in Taiwan. Requirements and Rules: (1) Regular attendance is required. Any reasonable absences should inform the teacher in advance or submit a formal leave-record afterwards. Students who are absent from the class without leave-records or who forget to bring the handouts covered in each class meeting will get a 2-point deduction of their final grades each time. (2) No smartphone, i-pad, e-reader, or notebook computer using is allowed during the class and exam time. Violators will get a 2-point deduction of their final grades for each violation. DO NOT cheat in film-watching, in-class exercises and exams. Students who violate the honesty policy will definitely fail this course.
